attributes.action: Mothers who stop fathers from seeing their child should be prosecuted
attributes.additional_details: The effect of this on kids is a No No. the psychological effect on child and father is a damage to our society
attributes.background: Prosecute mothers who for no just reason do everything possible to stop father from seeing the child

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/633765

Decisions about investigating and prosecuting alleged crimes are a matter for the police and Crown Prosecution Service, not the Government or Parliament.
